text: All-dressed chips are a potato chip flavour, popular in Canada. The flavour is a combination of barbecue, ketchup, sour cream and onion, and salt and vinegar flavours. In 2016, American food manufacturer Frito-Lay began to sell their all-dressed Ruffles potato chip in the United States. == References == Category:Snack foods Category:Canadian food
title: All-dressed
